messages.help:
ğŸ“š **Available Commands:**

ğŸ­ **Fun & Quotes:**
/hazil - Random programming joke
/iqtibos - Motivational quote

ğŸ”§ **Utilities:**
/ping - Bot status
/stats - Usage statistics
/weather city - Weather info
/github user - GitHub user info
/metrics - Performance dashboard

ğŸš€ **AI Project Management:**
/analyze requirement - Break down development tasks
/create_project name - Create new project
/add_member @user skills - Add team member
/workload - Team workload analysis
/list_projects - Show all projects
/list_team - Show team members

ğŸ’¡ Use /help command for detailed info!
